fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.trace

Interface Tracer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleTracer, CSVTracer

    public interface Tracer
    Simple tracer service definition. Log users should not worry about providing time information: the logger puts time-stamps by itself.
    Author:
    syl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createMessageLog(String topic) 
      void createValueLog(String name)
      These methods must be called first for initialising logging.
      void logMessage(String topic, String message)
      Trace a message published on a topic by agents in the simulation.
      void logValue(String name, float value)
      Trace a particular value computed in the simulation: temperature, electricity consumption...
